page.title: 10LIFE-STYLE/SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: We have seen something of village life -style within the block (page 9); its close neighbourly simplicity can be contrasted favourably with some of the present day urban problems. There are, however, certain worries & concerns in the communities about declining facili ties for religious worship, education, welfare. Such problems might worsen if there were any further cut-backs in public transport. The railways gone & only one village bus route. E.G.: RELIGION- No CofE in block. Those late of Binchester & Newfield pulled down. Sunday School has been asked for in Binchester Community Centre. Only one Methodist Chapel-Newfield- still open, others empty or put to secular use. EDUCATION- Schools at Binchester and Newfield now closed. Nearest juniors - Byers Green; secondary, B/Auckland. MEDICAL-Nearest doctor, Byers Green.
